description: Crunchy and lightly spiced, these crispy chicken wings will leave everyone wanting more.
name: Buttermilk Chicken Wings in A Floured Spiced Crust Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine a cracked and beaten egg with the buttermilk. Add all the herbs and spices to the bowl and combine fully.
Add the chicken wings to the marinate, then cover and refrigerate overnight. The next day, combine the flour, baking powder and cornstarch in a separate bowl.
Take 4 tbs of the marinade from the fridge and combine it fully into the flour mixture. Pre-heat the oven to 150Â°C.
Heat up a shallow fry pan to a medium heat. Take the marinated chicken wings and dip into the flour mixture ensuring all parts are covered evenly.
Shallow fry the chicken, turning half way, for 5 minutes in total and then leave to one side.
Transfer the fried chicken wings to a suitable baking tray and bake in the oven for another 20 minutes or until fully cooked through. Remove from the oven and serve with a choice of condiments.
